history.proof: intros. unfold sum_n_m. induction n. - inversion H. - qauto depth: 4 l: on use: inj_minus2, Nat.le_0_l, Nat.sub_diag, lt_n_Sm_le, Nat.lt_succ_r unfold: lt, iter_nat, iter, AbelianGroup.sort, gt, Init.Nat.sub, seq.iota, BinIntDef.Z.of_nat inv: le.

exceptions.tactic: intros G a m n H.
intros G' a m n H.
intros G' a' m n H.
intros G' a' m' n H.
intros G' a' m' n' H.

exceptions.exn: In environment G : AbelianGroup a : nat -> G n, m : nat H : (m < S n)%nat IHn : (m < n)%nat -> iter_nat plus zero a n m = zero Unable to unify "plus ?M2435 zero = ?M2435" with "iter_nat plus zero a (S n) m = zero".

original: intros G a m n H. unfold sum_n_m. induction n. - intros. inversion H. - intros. apply plus_zero_r.
